revised_title: Index of Proper Names in Thomas Birch's 'The History of the Royal Society'
tldr: This article provides an index of proper names found in Thomas Birch's 'The History of the Royal Society' (1756-1757), which covers the early history of the Royal Society, its members, and their relations with learned individuals in the British Isles. The index aims to assist scholars in researching the early years of the society and its members' contributions to science.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
